name: Street Skater 3D: 2
description:
Street Skater 3D: 2 is the game to play for all skate lovers out there. Play Street Skater 3D: 2 and improve your skating skills. Get as many coins as you can and purchase different skaters or upgrades for your power-ups. You can also get different skateboards —choose among 25 different skateboards! Tap to jump and drag to do some crazy tricks. Jump on rails to grind them and then do some tricks to score bonus combo coins. TIP: crazy combos give you lots of coins!
Choose between 2 different controller setups (buttons or accelerometer).
Street Skater 3d2 is all about skating your way through town. Avoid obstacles and cars. Try to set a highscore every single time you play. What are you waiting for? Download Street Skater 3d2 now!

Features:

- 7 different skaters.
- 25 skateboards.
- 2 power-ups to boost your performance.
- Continue feature included.
- Real skating moves and tricks.
- Excellent 3d graphics.
- Skating music all the way!
